duties_responsibilities.duty: Inspect completed products and perform routine equipment maintenance
Disassemble, troubleshoot, repair, reassemble, and test various types of electrical, hand operated, and pneumatic rental equipment
Prepare each job in accordance with a job order or verbal/written instruction and perform inspection of completed product in accordance with company quality standards
Load and unload delivery vehicles, lifting and arranging products according to assigned deliveries
Transport rental/sales orders in designated vehicles in a timely manner
Ensure proper maintenance of delivery vehicle, including checking oil and fuel, keeping vehicle neat and clean, and reporting all accidents/damage/malfunctions to the Warehouse Foreman
